name: Ichaival
description: Ichaival, the bow of Odin. Rumored to fire 10 arrows with every pull of the string.  It has gold and silver ornaments on it, as well as an ornate Raven.

name: orichalcum arrow
description: An arrow composed of a sliver of orichalcum. The arrow has a mysterous glow. Has a very high chance of staying intact when fired, however can only be fired from Ichaival.
